properties.question: Where is the Harappan site known for the world's earliest ploughed field?
properties.brief: c. 2500 BCE; Located on the banks of the ancient Ghaggar River.

properties.question: When did the Battle of Rajasthan (Pratihara vs Arabs) occur?
properties.brief: Nagabhata I defeated the Umayyad forces, halting the Arab expansion.

properties.question: Where did Dulha Rai establish the first Kachwaha capital?
properties.brief: 1137; The foundation of the Dhundhar kingdom on Devgiri Hill.

properties.question: When was the first Battle of Tarain fought?
properties.brief: Prithviraj Chauhan III defeated Muhammad Ghori near Thanesar.

properties.question: Where did Hammir Dev Chauhan take his final stand?
properties.brief: 1301; Witnessed the first recorded Jauhar in Rajasthan.

properties.question: When did Rana Hamir Singh recapture Chittorgarh?
properties.brief: Founder of the Sisodia dynasty and 'Arimardan' (destroyer of enemies).

properties.question: Where is the fort built by Rana Kumbha with a 36km wall?
properties.brief: 1458; The wall is known as the Great Wall of India.

properties.question: When was the Vijay Stambh (Tower of Victory) completed?
properties.brief: Built by Rana Kumbha to mark his win over the Malwa-Gujarat alliance.

properties.question: Where did the Second Saka occur under Rani Karnavati?
properties.brief: 1535; Followed by the invasion of Bahadur Shah of Gujarat.

properties.question: When did the Battle of Giri-Sumel take place?
properties.brief: Sher Shah Suri vs Rao Maldeo; Sher Shah nearly lost the battle.

properties.question: When did Akbar hold the Nagaur Darbar?
properties.brief: A major diplomatic event that brought most Rajputs into the Mughal fold.

properties.question: Where did the forces of Maharana Pratap and Man Singh clash?
properties.brief: 1576; The battle of 'Thermopylae of Mewar'.

properties.question: When did the Battle of Dewair occur?
properties.brief: Colonel Tod described this as the 'Marathon of Mewar'.

properties.question: Where did Raja Rai Singh build the Junagarh Fort?
properties.brief: 1594; Famous for its extensive art and lack of a hill site.

properties.question: When was the Mughal-Mewar Treaty signed?
properties.brief: Signed by Prince Khurram and Rana Amar Singh I.

properties.question: Where did Sawai Jai Singh II establish the 'Pink City'?
properties.brief: 1727; One of the earliest examples of grid-based town planning.

properties.question: When was the Hurda Conference held?
properties.brief: Rajput rulers met to discuss the growing Maratha threat.

properties.question: Where is the invincible 'Iron Fort' located?
properties.brief: Lohagarh; Known for repelling Lord Lake's British siege in 1805.

properties.question: When did the 1857 Uprising start in Nasirabad?
properties.brief: Sparked on May 28th by the 15th Bengal Native Infantry.

properties.question: Where did the Revolution of 1857 begin in Rajasthan?
properties.brief: The first military cantonment in the state to revolt.

properties.question: When was the modern state of Rajasthan fully integrated?
properties.brief: Completed on November 1st with the merger of Ajmer and Abu.
